data.text: @PavoWellbeing @PTHBhealth @HonestDrJohn Thanks for info. Customers from England @gallery_tower seem very blasé. One of the ongoing probs of being right on the border.
@KnightonMuseum @PTHBhealth @HonestDrJohn It's definitely not over, I know the @PTHBhealth spring booster vaccination programme is in the pipeline so hopefully that will help.
@MargLloyd @KnightonMuseum @PavoWellbeing @PTHBhealth @HonestDrJohn Me too felt bad on days I forgot to do it too.
@RothesayTownCat @PavoWellbeing @PTHBhealth @HonestDrJohn All we can do is cross our paws and toesies.

@KnightonMuseum @PavoWellbeing @PTHBhealth @HonestDrJohn hoomin has also...we are appalled at tha
dangerous policy here😿
@KnightonMuseum @PavoWellbeing @PTHBhealth I’m not well up on the surveillance systems, but Zoe seemed a good one, so it seems a shame. And, no it’s not over.
@KnightonMuseum @PavoWellbeing @PTHBhealth @HonestDrJohn So have I. Typical of this Government😡
